Description: SNOMED INT enriched with UMLS and trained unsupervised on MIMIC-III
Location: MedCAT Rosalind machine, available for public download from https://github.com/CogStack/MedCAT

MetaCAT models.Status: Detects is a concept Affirmed or Negated/Hypothetical

config.ner['min_name_len'].description: Minimum detection length (found terms/mentions shorter than this will not be detected).

config.ner['upper_case_limit_len'].description: All detected terms shorter than this value have to be uppercase, otherwise they will be ignored.

config.linking['similarity_threshold'].description: If the confidence of the model is lower than this a detection will be ignore.

config.general['spell_check_len_limit'].description: Words shorter than this will not be spell checked.
